Long, long, past due & has important social benefits for all , while reducing the stigma.of poverty , a very important benefit.

Building codes kept/keep the poor out and create both poverty & homelessness

content:
#Cdnpoli #Rent #Landlord

Renting 101. If your counting on bureaucracy of the uncaring your screwed .

I've rented & am a landlord. My lease requires that you have a tenants package & provide proof , or your evicted as that avoids all these issues, for a few dollars..

I understand legally he can do the repairs & deduct from rent .

If that fails do what .Da boys & I did when a landlord refused to refund the damage deposit,. Drop by his home & help him find Jesus

https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/hamilton/family-flood-apartment-1.6834190

card.title: A Hamilton family's apartment was flooded 7 months ago. They're still waiting for landlord to do repairs | CBC News
card.description: The landlord at 235 Rebecca St. is demanding the family pay almost $12K for damages in order to do repairs or face eviction. The city's bylaw officers haven't issued any repair orders, and the family says they're running out of options.

content:
@QasimRashid

A large - and mostly overlooked - segment of homelessness is caused by high rents, not addiction or mental illness.

Drug addiction and mental illness exists everywhere. Grinding, Dickensian poverty does not.

#rent #rents #RentSeeking #homelessness #homeless #unhoused #poverty #capitalism #MentalHealth #MentalIllness #Addiction #DrugAddiction #Austerity #Neglect #PrivateProperty

content:
Oh fun, my #landlord has issued me a #rentalIncrease notification. They want to raise my #rent by 11%.

Literally the only thing that has changed is the market. There has been zero improvement to the apartment. In fact, at one point during this lease year, we went more than 3 months waiting for a basic repair.

Sure could do with better tenant protections and a sensible cap on rent increases.

#Sydney #AusPol #NSWPol

content:
#Cdnpoli #Rent

'Completely misleading' landlord letters threaten tenants with eviction

The details are immaterial as the only law is if you don't own it you don't control it and you will ultimately lose .

I have a sister and brother that retired . They did the math and both bought mini homes , 3 bedroom, 2 bath, 1200sg feet heat pumps, for about $100,000.

Their cost to operate less than rent and both homes now worth over $250,000

Can landlords increase your rent as much as they want in Georgia?

Yes. They can set your rent at whatever amount they wish. üò≤ üò°

"Georgia law is pretty clear. It says that local #governments here can not #regulate the amount of rent charged by a landlord.

content:
#Cdnpoli #Nspoli #Cottage #Rent

Just saw an article that said if I wanted to rent my cottage I had to register withe NS Govt .

My cottage is on 2 1/2 acres on a private lake, with a private road etc and I pay full taxes, but receive no services whatsoever for taxes paid, other than garbage collection I care not about .

The Golden Covid Rule

NS Govt go Fk yourself .

We all must asses our own risks and make our own choices & I have .That leaves you out .

content:
@ChrisMayLA6 watched a great documentary on BBC three last night called "evicted". One of the women's rent was put up by 66%! Others were just told they had to leave without being given a reason or because they had complained about there not being any hot water. I cannot believe that any of this is legal in the uk and renters don't have any type of protection!
#rent

account.note: German who came to the uk for love almost 20 years ago. Games environment artist and mother of two Welsh-German mongrels. #art #mastoart #artistonmasto

content:
The UK's #housingcrisis in a single statistic:

Average #rent in #London: ¬£2500
Average rent across the UK: ¬£1190

When you know the average (mean) take home salary in the UK is around ¬£2600, you can see that even outside London for the average worker rent accounts for around 45% of take home pay...

This is the brutal reality of a country on the side of landlords not tenants - almost th dictionary definition of #rentiercapitalism!

This cannot be sustainable nor should it be!

content:
@ChrisMayLA6 watched a great documentary on BBC three last night called "evicted". One of the women's rent was put up by 66%! Others were just told they had to leave without being given a reason or because they had complained about there not being any hot water. I cannot believe that any of this is legal in the uk and renters don't have any type of protection!
#rent

account.note: German who came to the uk for love almost 20 years ago. Games environment artist and mother of two Welsh-German mongrels. #art #mastoart #artistonmasto

content:
The UK's #housingcrisis in a single statistic:

Average #rent in #London: ¬£2500
Average rent across the UK: ¬£1190

When you know the average (mean) take home salary in the UK is around ¬£2600, you can see that even outside London for the average worker rent accounts for around 45% of take home pay...

This is the brutal reality of a country on the side of landlords not tenants - almost th dictionary definition of #rentiercapitalism!

This cannot be sustainable nor should it be!

content:
#Cdnpoli #Rent #Landlord

Renting 101. If your counting on bureaucracy of the uncaring your screwed .

I've rented & am a landlord. My lease requires that you have a tenants package & provide proof , or your evicted as that avoids all these issues, for a few dollars..

I understand legally he can do the repairs & deduct from rent .

If that fails do what .Da boys & I did when a landlord refused to refund the damage deposit,. Drop by his home & help him find Jesus

card.title: A Hamilton family's apartment was flooded 7 months ago. They're still waiting for landlord to do repairs | CBC News
card.description: The landlord at 235 Rebecca St. is demanding the family pay almost $12K for damages in order to do repairs or face eviction. The city's bylaw officers haven't issued any repair orders, and the family says they're running out of options.

content:
@QasimRashid

A large - and mostly overlooked - segment of homelessness is caused by high rents, not addiction or mental illness.

Drug addiction and mental illness exists everywhere. Grinding, Dickensian poverty does not.

content:
Oh fun, my #landlord has issued me a #rentalIncrease notification. They want to raise my #rent by 11%.

Literally the only thing that has changed is the market. There has been zero improvement to the apartment. In fact, at one point during this lease year, we went more than 3 months waiting for a basic repair.

Sure could do with better tenant protections and a sensible cap on rent increases.

#Sydney #AusPol #NSWPol
